original_text: And these will go away into eternal punishment, but the righteous into eternal life.”
korean_text: 그들은 영벌에, 의인들은 영생에 들어가리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And these will go away into eternal punishment
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 사람들은 영원한 형벌 속으로 떠나갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: but the righteous into eternal life
